title: Turmoil on RFK Jr.'s turf detailed at Senate hearing: Key moments
shortDescription: Susan Monarez led the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention until she says she was pushed out by Robert F. Kennedy Jr.

title: Epstein files take center stage in FBI director's testimony to Congress
shortDescription: Democratic lawmakers pressed FBI Director Kash Patel on why he hasn't released more information related to Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Melania Trump wears dramatic wide-brim hat at UK state visit
shortDescription: First Lady Melania Trump wore a dramatic, purple wide-brim hat, evoking memories of her Inauguration Day look, during a U.K. state visit.

title: 'Organized' Trump protesters could face investigations, deputy AG says
shortDescription: Todd Blanche said people who noisily protest President Trump could face criminal investigations if their actions are tied to groups pushing violence.

title: CEOs flock to reception for Trump state visit: What to know
shortDescription: Top executives from Fortune 500 companies are attending a luncheon British Prime Minister Keir Starmer is throwing President Donald Trump.

title: Trump with Prince William and Princess Kate leads to height questions
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is in the UK for a state visit. He was greeted by Prince William and Princess Kate as he stood with Melania Trump. How tall?

title: The King and Trump: President gets largest ever state visit to UK
shortDescription: Alongside first lady Melania Trump, President Trump became the first elected leader to be hosted for two U.K. state visits.

title: Trump arrives at Windsor Castle in UK
shortDescription: President Donald Trump arrived at Windsor Castle to a grand welcome, where he joined King Charles III in inspecting the guard of honour.

title: Lawmakers pitch bill to revive LGBTQ+ youth lifeline eliminated by Trump
shortDescription: The 988 LGBTQ+ Youth Access Act would direct HHS to dedicate funding toward reviving the program, which the Trump administration scrapped in July.

title: President Trump says Republicans will hold a midterm convention
shortDescription: President Trump said Republicans will have a midterm convention in 2026 as the White House looks to maintain Republicans' power in Congress.

title: Trump-Epstein Windsor stunt sparks arrests
shortDescription: Trump and Epstein's images were projected onto Windsor Castle as protests erupted during the president's visit to the UK.

title: RFK Jr. ousted the CDC chief. She testifies today in the Senate.
shortDescription: Susan Monarez’s lawyers say she got fired for her refusal to “rubber-stamp unscientific, reckless directives and fire dedicated health experts.”

title: Are Trump's tariffs the kind of 'major question' that doomed Biden's agenda?
shortDescription: A principle the Supreme Court relied on to block President Biden's policies could be central to whether President Trump's worldwide tariffs are legal.

title: Britain deploys gilded pomp and pageantry to keep Trump 'sweet'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump, a superfan of the British royal family, attends a rare second state visit in the UK. The red carpet is being rolled out.

title: God save the queen: Pranksters project Trump, Epstein on Windsor Castle
shortDescription: The group was arrested for an "unauthorized projection." The arrests come amid protests over Trump's visit to England.

title: Congress asks if Boar's Head plant tied to outbreak should reopen
shortDescription: The Boar’s Head plant that was at the center of last year’s deadly listeria outbreak is set to reopen with lawmakers questioning if it is premature.

title: President Trump returns to UK for state visit
shortDescription: President Donald Trump landed in London for his second U.K. state visit.

title: Image of enslaved man becomes new flashpoint in Trump's history review
shortDescription: Critics see the Trump-ordered review of public displays as an effort to whitewash dark eras of American history.

title: FBI director clashes with Democrats over Kirk, Epstein
shortDescription: The Trump appointee told critics on Tuesday to “please, bring it on.”
